title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5319.17 - Patch wires
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5319.17 - Patch wires

State Regulations

All patch wires and track cuts shall be documented in a
service manual and/or service bulletin and shall be submitted to the testing
laboratory. This requirement does not prohibit required repairs in the
field. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
5319.17

Adopted

New

York State Register November 16, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 46, eff. 11/16/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
